# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="cbf74-102">Tisk e-mailů, kalendáře a přílohy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbf74-103">Při tisku e-mailové zprávy:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-104">Vyberte zprávu, kterou chcete vytisknout.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-105">V pravém horním rohu zprávy vyberte tři tečky a pak vyberte možnost **Tisk**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbf74-106">Tisk kalendáře:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-107">V pravém horním rohu stránky vyberte možnost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-108">**Tisk**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-109">Zvolte oblast zobrazení a čas a vyberte možnost **Tisk**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbf74-110">Chcete-li vytisknout přílohy:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-111">Otevřete zprávu obsahující přílohu, kterou chcete vytisknout.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-112">Přesuňte kurzor na přílohu a vyberte ikonu **Stáhnout**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="cbf74-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-113"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-114">Po stažení souboru má otevřete příslušnou aplikaci a zvolte možnost tisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cbf74-115">Například otevřít soubor DOC v aplikaci Word a potom vytisknout.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbf74-116">Další informace naleznete v tématu [Tisk e-mailových zpráv, příloh a kalendáře v aplikaci Outlook na webu](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbf74-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
